name: CROSSSHOCK
description:
A Super Juicy Arena Sword Battler Made in 5 Days For Juice Jam 2.

I Recommend that you play this game by downloading the EXE as it has far better performance than the WebGL version, However you do you.

***************Story/Lore***************

In the Stick Man Dimension, you play as a retired Mercenary, who is put in a room to be killed so you can pay the price for your sins... So due to your instincts you pick up your blade and start fighting, surviving in the room for 3 minutes will grant you let you win this challenge. 

//////////////////CONTROLS//////////////////

WASD to Move, Hold Right Click To Dash, Hold Left Click To Swing Release Left Button At Red Indicator To Get Perfect Swing.

TIP: Green Enemies only die after a PERFECT Swing

^^^^^^^^^^CREDITS^^^^^^^^^^

Music, Art, Programming, SFX: Arthur Sokolov

FEEL Plugin: More Mountains

LeanTween: DentedPixel
